name: Swab the Decks
start_description: The decks need a good swabbing matey. Let's get to it.
finish_description: The decks are clean enough to eat off of. Great job!

name: Load Cargo
start_description: This cargo needs loading. Let's put our backs into it mate!
finish_description: That was hard work, but it's worth it.

name: Chop Wood
start_description: We need wood to make stuff. Let's get to chopping swabby!
finish_description: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Harvest Cotton
start_description: The cotton is ready to harvest.
finish_description: Good job matey! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Mine Iron
start_description: Let's scuttle that ore you scallywag.
finish_description: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Collect Mermaid Scales
start_description: Use nets to drag the waters for lost booty. We might find Mermaid Scales if we're lucky.
finish_description: Those are the Mermaid Scales we were looking for. Great work!

name: Catch Smugglers
start_description: Those dirty smugglers stay in the shallows. Use the oars to chase them down!
finish_description: That smugglers Compass will come in handy. Well done!

name: Ambush Traders
start_description: Traders see us on the horizon a flee. If we anchor in the mists just out of port, they will never see us coming.
finish_description: That is a fancy Spyglass you found. We should be able to put that to good use.

name: Hammer-Dead Sharks
start_description: Hammer-Dead sharks are attacking ships in this area. Use the Spyglass to avoid a run in with those beasties.
finish_description: Calm seas and we found some treasure to boot!

name: Follow the Robo-Dolphin
start_description: Robo-Dolphins will lead old salty dogs to treasure. Let's see if we can tail one to some goods.
finish_description: Thanks to Mecha-Flipper we have some new shinies!

name: Raid the Landlubbers
start_description: Let's bribe a landlubber guard with a Mermaid scale and sneak into their town.
finish_description: Once we were inside the town was ripe for the picking.

name: Down with the Deep Ones
start_description: These slimy bilge rats are scaring off the traders. Time to send them to see Davy Jones!
finish_description: Back to the deep with those ones!

name: A Game of Djinn Rummy
start_description: That Djinn took our rum! After it!!
finish_description: Well done matey!

name: Fight the Dread Pirate Robots
start_description: Inconceivable...
finish_description: This booty is worth more than a peanut.

name: Hunt the Mecha-Whale
start_description: There she blows, the White Mecha-Whale!
finish_description: Arr, that beast was tough! Good job driving it off mate.

name: Weather the Storm
start_description: Batten down the hatches, there's a mighty squall coming!
finish_description: That was a rough storm, but it brought some good to our shores.

name: Defeat the Merman King
start_description: Tritons fury is upon us! To arms!!
finish_description: That should teach those scaly sea rats a lesson!

name: Find the Lost Isle of Gold
start_description: We found a map to the lost Island of Gold! Let's set sail!
finish_description: Well done and raise those cups! We found riches fit for a true Pirate Lord!

name: Chop More Wood
start_description: We need wood to make stuff. Let's get to chopping swabby!
finish_description: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Harvest More Cotton
start_description: The cotton is ready to harvest.
finish_description: Good job matey! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Mine More Iron
start_description: Let's scuttle that ore you scallywag.
finish_description: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.

name: Roll the Bones
start_description: Feeling lucky? Ante up and roll those bones for a chance at winning big!
finish_description: I couldn't look...did we win?

name: The Motherload
start_description: We're hunting a trade ship. Let's hope they have a heavy cargo.
finish_description: That's a shiny prize mate. Well done!

name: Get Your Sea Legs
start_description: Let's review the basics and get this pirate some valuable experience.
finish_description: That was a valuable lesson.

name: A Pirate's Best Friend
start_description: We must get a Musket. See what I did there?
finish_description: More goods for the holds mate!

name: Negotiation Tools
start_description: When negotiating, nothing helps make your point like a Dagger.
finish_description: Another successful adventure.

name: Cut to the Point
start_description: Cutlass, no mate, cut more!
finish_description: This stash will look good in our vaults.

name: Meet Billy
start_description: Let's see if we can locate our old friend Billy Club
finish_description: More loot for the lads and lasses!

name: Moving on up
start_description: A Grappling Hook is like a key for high windows.
finish_description: A fine bounty matey!

name: Bobo's Bounty
start_description: Legend has it that a monkey became a Pirate Captain, and this map leads to his bounty.
finish_description: So many old crates of fruit. At least we found some good shinies amongst that mess.

name: Glitterfin's Glory
start_description: We have located a shipwreck on a small island. The sails have a goldfish on them...
finish_description: The wreckage looked mighty odd, like something burst the hull from the inside. Oh well, let's be off with this treasure now.

name: It's a Slippery Sloop
start_description: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Sloop.
finish_description: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?

name: Get that Galleon
start_description: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Galleon.
finish_description: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?

name: Any Port in a Storm
start_description: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any ship plans in stock.
finish_description: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?

name: What, the Frigate?
start_description: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Frigate.
finish_description: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?

name: Decked Out
start_description: What's a pirate without his fancies, I ask ye?
finish_description: Not much of a pirate, says I.

name: Coin of the Realm
start_description: It's a toss up.
finish_description: I can't make neither heads nor tails of it.

name: Make No Bones About It
start_description: Dead men tell no tales..
finish_description: ...and they also make great centerpieces.

name: A Twist of Fate
start_description: Nothing ventured..
finish_description: Nothing gained?

name: Returning the Party Favor
start_description: Spose it weren't too smart to pillage a magical totem, eh? If we return this one mayhaps the curse will be lifted and we'll finally see some fair winds.
finish_description: Looks just like the original... don't it?

name: Parrot Down
start_description: I've yet to see a single Parrot perch there.
finish_description: So why do they call it Parrot's Perch?

name: Quest for Booty!
start_description: A Skiff might be a simple ship, but it will get us on the waters.
finish_description: A'Sailin' we will go!

name: [FG] The Power of Broship
start_description: The Brothers of Broseph bring a bevy of bountiful bonuses.
finish_description: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?

name: [FG] Dealer, Deal'em
start_description: It wasn't in the cards this time.
finish_description: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?

name: [FG] Stay Salty
start_description: Gah. Swabs, the lot of 'em.
finish_description: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: It wasn't in the cards this time.
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: It wasn't in the cards this time.
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: It wasn't in the cards this time.
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Ah well, we still have drink!
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Ah well, we still have drink!
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Ah well, we still have drink!
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Gah. Swabs, the lot of 'em.
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Gah. Swabs, the lot of 'em.
finish_description: What do we do with this?

name: [FG] Salvage Idols
start_description: Gah. Swabs, the lot of 'em.
finish_description: What do we do with this?
